data.title: Best Bach: "Christmas Oratorio" [QUIZ]
data.meta_description: How well do you know J.S. Bach's Christmas masterpiece? Find out!
data.text:
How well do you know this holiday classic?

Explore Bach’s classical Christmas masterpiece.

Listen to Bach’s “Christmas Oratorio” on our “Classical Christmas” stream.

How well do your friends know this piece? Send them the link to the quiz and find out!

Post updated December 17, 2018.

Support provided by:

You May Also Like

"Christmas Oratorio": Bach's Six-Part Classical Masterpiece

How should you embrace this masterpiece -- Germany's equivalent of the Messiah -- as six separate cantatas, each on its own, or as a single-setting, three-hour work? (Spoiler alert: we suggest both.)

2018 Holiday Gift Guide for the Classically Curious

Looking for gift ideas for that special someone? Check out a few of our favorite things for classical music fans and curious folk!

Toy Story Meets Nutcracker? Respighi's "La Boutique Fantasque"

Based on piano music by Gioachino Rossini, Ottorino Respighi's charming one-act ballet "La Boutique Fantasque," or "The Magic Toyshop," is festive, fun listening -- from the mysterious opening bars to the slam-bang finish, we dare you not to tap your toes the whole way through!
